entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish --self-contained can't handle build-time references #24434
  • global.json version mismatch warning is not actionable #24429
  • runtimesettings.dev.json is gone ; surprising breakage #24427
  • error NETSDK1083: The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'ubuntu.22.04-x64' is not recognized when doing source building package for Ubuntu Jammy 22.04 #24425
  • dotnet tool install fails if version contains uppercase #24419

PullRequests

Created

  • Make the net6 warning when running in 16.11 say or higher #24431
  • [dotnet-watch] Skip Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_ReadsLaunchSettings_WhenUsingProjectOption as it is flaky #24428
  • Update feature flag logic to disable only semantics #24426
    Area-DotNet Test

Merged

  • Move WebAssembly ProjectCapability to props file #24237
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix unstable test #24410
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24302
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update minimum vs version to 17.2 #24438
  • Properly handle empty solution and project paths in SDK resolver #24333
    Area-SdkResolvers
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1669238 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Add support for RazorLangVersion 7.0 #24383
    Area-AspNetCore
